overview: Best of Friends is a Sesame Street DVD featuring clips from the show starring several of the show's central characters - Elmo, Mr. Snuffleupagus, Oscar the Grouch, Telly Monster, Count von Count, Grover, Cookie Monster, Big Bird, Bert and Ernie, Zoe, Abby Cadabby, and Rosita. Segments are organized by each of these characters.
title: Sesame Street: Best of Friends
